Donate

We still Need Your Support!

﻿Thank you all for your support this far!

There are still outstanding constuction costs, need to finish the flooring of the 2nd floor hall and ongoing expenses now that we're open.

You can support the masjid with a tax deductible donation:

  • by electronic donation - use PayPal button below
  • by pledging a donation. We will contact you for arrangements.
  • by mail
  • Kardeh-Hassan (interest-free loan)

You can also support the masjid with your time, willingness to help, spread the word about the masjid and your dua's.

If you have any questions, wish to tour the masjid, and/or make a donation, please feel free to contact us.

Jazak Allah Khair. 

  • Donation

    Click Paypal button. Adjust quantity in pop-up screen to reflect desired donation amount in $1 increments. For example, set the quantity to 100 to make a $100 donation.
